title: Patellofemoral Pain Syndrome Rehabilitation
content: Patellofemoral pain syndrome presents as anterior knee pain related to patellofemoral joint dysfunction. Treatment focuses on quadriceps strengthening (particularly vastus medialis), hip abductor and external rotator strengthening, patellofemoral taping techniques, and activity modification. Foot orthoses may benefit patients with excessive pronation. Progressive return to activity follows pain reduction and functional improvement.
